name: Dump Garbage Truck Simulator – Drive your real dumping machine & clean up the mess from giant city
name_original: Dump Garbage Truck Simulator – Drive your real dumping machine & clean up the mess from giant city
description:
Lets drive mega garbage trucks with this amazing “Dump Garbage Truck Simulator”. Collect the mess from different locations through the city and dumps it to the junkyard. Drive crazy in rush using your ultimate driving Skills, pick up the trash from waste containers and empty those in the garbage truck. Move through the metropolis; rush to the junkyard and then recycle the rubbish there.

Dump garbage truck simulator consists of two modes, including free drive mode for driving freely without any time constraints and career mode for playing in twenty challenging missions. To enhance gaming experience multiple camera views are also available which will make the gameplay more interesting.

“Dump Garbage Truck Simulator” is a wonderful truck 3d simulator with stunningly realistic graphics and extremely challenging mission to achieve. It’s a driving racing mania game with a very addicting and full of suspense gameplay. Now make a healthy environment by cleaning up all the dirty and messy places. Perform your duty completely as a trash truck driver and get success in achieving mission objects and tasks for getting access to further extreme targets and challenges.

Garbage truck simulator is a fun contributor app for everyone.
Features

- 4 Mega monster garbage trucks to drive.
- 20 levels of extreme challenges.
- Two modes to drive in, including free driving mode and career mode.
- Multiple camera views to enhance gaming experience.
- Amazingly realistic graphics with HD background music and user-friendly interface.
